#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
#define MOD 1000006
//from mrkhanna17 to masterkhanna17
//no macros for now
using namespace std;
int main(){
   int t,i,j,n;
   string s;
   cin>>s;
   int p=s.size();
   int a[26];
   memset(a,0,sizeof(a));
   char lastc=s[0];
   int c=0;
   for(j=0;j<p;j++){
   if(lastc==s[j]){
   c++;
   }
   else{
   a[lastc-'a']=max(c,a[lastc-'a']);
   lastc=s[j];
   c=1;
   }
   }
   a[lastc-'a']=max(c,a[lastc-'a']);
   int max1=-1;
   for(j=0;j<26;j++)
   if(max1<a[j]){
   lastc=j+'a';
   max1=a[j];
   }
   cout<<lastc<<endl;
   cout<<max1<<endl;


return 0;
}
